roleset.name: refresh

example.name: adjectival
example.text: It's also refreshing [*] to read a Japanese author who clearly doesn't belong to the self-aggrandizing ``we-Japanese'' school of writers who perpetuate the notion of the unique Japanese, unfathomable by outsiders.
example.arg: [*] to read a Japanese author who clearly doesn't belong to the self-aggrandizing ``we-Japanese'' school of writers who perpetuate the notion of the unique Japanese, unfathomable by outsiders

roleset.note: Based on WSJ. Member of VNcls amuse-31.3. chg to amuse-31.1
